text:
In their video game Zack and Marta have a flag that Mug needs to protect. Mug moves the flag frequently.

In the following figure the flag has been rotated about the center C.

• What do you notice? What do you wonder?
  • How does the shape of the original flag compare to the shape of its image?
  • How many degrees has the original flag been rotated? Explain your reasoning.
  • Describe the relationship between a point on the flag, its image, and the center of rotation.
